00019 void TypeChangeRequestHandler:: handle_request_reliable(boost::shared_ptr<WorldInformation> world_information,
00020                                                         boost::shared_ptr<const Request> request) {
00021     boost::shared_ptr<const TypeChangeRequest> type_change_request =
00022          boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<const TypeChangeRequest> (request);
00023     if(!type_change_request) {
00024         throw std::invalid_argument("Not a type change request.");
00025     }
00026 
00027     const boost::shared_ptr<RobotIdentifier>& robot_id = type_change_request->robot().id();
00028     RobotData& robot_data = world_information->get_according_robot_data(robot_id);
00029     robot_data.set_type(type_change_request->requested_type());
00030 }
